name: 'Toy Story 2' Minutiae, Part 2 Online Trivia | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: Al steals Woody from the yard sale because Andy's mom won't sell Woody to him. Buzz hurries to try to rescue him, but is jolted off Al's car after opening the trunk. He sees the vanity license plate as a clue as to who Al is. How does the plate read?
questions.explanation:
LZTYBRN.

	Also, a feather float out of the car, a clue in itself.

questions.text: Who helps Buzz figure out what the license plate means?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Spell

	The other toys are busy setting up a re-enactment of the crime. Mr. Potato Head helps by sarcastically saying 'Let's leave Buzz to play with his toys'.

questions.text: How do the toys figure out where Al's store is?
options: Find a shopping bag in Andy's room

questions.text: What extra items does Mrs. Potato Head pack inside her husband (during the actual movie, not the outtakes)?
questions.correct: extra shoes and his angry eyes
questions.explanation:
extra shoes and his angry eyes.

	There are several humerous outtakes at the end of the movie showing her putting lots of other things into Mr. Potato Head.

questions.text: There are five toys in the rescue party. Which one is the last to leave Andy's rooftop?
questions.explanation:
Slinky Dog.

	Slinky lowers all the others to the ground first, then jumps off last.

questions.text: When Woody first gets left alone in Al's apartment, he tries to escape through a vent, but can't remove a screw because he can only use his left arm. Where is the screw located on the grill?
Who is the first Roundup Gang toy that Woody encounters?
questions.explanation:
Bullseye.

	He comes from behind Woody and slips under him.

questions.text: Why is Stinky Pete in his box?
options: The box is sealed too tightly for the toys to open it
He'll fall apart if he's exposed to air
questions.explanation:
To retain his mint condition.

	Toy collecters pay more for mint condition toy that are still in their original packaging.

questions.text: How many different sayings will Stinky Pete say if you pull his string?
questions.explanation:
9.

	His box says he'll say 9 different sayings. We don't get to hear any, because he's never touched by anyone who could pull it.

questions.text: How does Woody's arm completely fall off?
questions.correct: Loose thread catches on display stand
options: Jessie pulls it off in a fight
It comes off after they fall off of the record player
Thread catches on venting grate that Woody tries to escape through
questions.explanation: Loose thread catches on display stand.
